alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lake County through 830 PM PDT... At 759 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barkerville, or 18 miles east of Upper Lake, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hough Springs, Barkerville and Indian Valley Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
